definition: (of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities

sentences.english: The current vegetable price slump has taken its toll on Chinese farmers.

sentences.english: Connaught in good faith observe the operating principle of serving the majority of users.
sentences.chinese: 本着诚信守诺的经营原则服务于广大用户。

sentences.english: It is the rail and commercial center for the vast northern section of the country. Population, 385, 603.

sentences.english: We warmly welcome all our customers, old and new, in and abroad, with our most sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 万联轴承真诚欢迎广大国内外新老客户。

sentences.english: Workshop director of high-strength comrades wholeheartedly welcome customers to negotiate business.

sentences.english: We welcome the broad masses of old and new customers continue to support the Company.

sentences.english: The same is very much the case in Africa's fragile post-colonial nations.
sentences.chinese: 这一点，对于非洲广大后殖民地国家来说，同样如此。

sentences.english: Nuwa not only to the day of salvation, but also in creation, work miracles.
sentences.chinese: 女娲不但补天救世，还创造万物，神通广大。

sentences.english: It is greatly welcomed with a mass of enterprises and has built up a good company credit standing within and outside food industry.
sentences.chinese: 深受广大企业的青睐，在业内外享有良好的企业信誉。

sentences.english: So, everyone. Please don’t be blaming porn on your relationship problems.
sentences.chinese: 因此，广大群众，请不要因为感情问题而责怪不雅物。

sentences.english: The priest always preaches on grace to a large congregation.
sentences.chinese: 牧师经常向广大会众讲关于恩典的道理。

sentences.english: I company produces the hubei type finely machine also quite broad new old customer's favour.

sentences.english: By popular demand, the play will run for another week.
sentences.chinese: 应广大观众要求，这出戏将加演一周。

definition: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
to receive in no small measure
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
all walks of life/all social circles
ever since a long time ago
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
